name: Checkers (Kleber Andrade)
description:
Checkers is a simple but challenging board game involving strategy and played by two players on a board game.

One player has dark pieces, and one player has light pieces. They take turns moving their pieces. Players move their pieces diagonally from one square to another square. When a player jumps over their opponent's (the other player's) piece, he takes that piece from the board. 

The player's goal is to take all the pieces of its opponent.

Checkers (also known as Draughts) has been around for centuries, but it has never looked this good in a package this small. Take a great-looking game of checkers with you wherever you go with Checkers

Checkers supports both 1 player and 2 player gameplay, so you can play against friends or test your skills against a challenging computer opponent.
